title: RedPoint Global to Present Importance of Machine Learning in Big Data at Strata + Hadoop World 2015 New York
text:
RedPoint Global Inc. 
WELLESLEY HILLS, MA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/24/15 -- Look forward or be left behind. This is the crux of the session on machine learning in big data that RedPoint Global's Bill Porto will deliver at this year's Strata + Hadoop World 2015 in New York on September 30. RedPoint Global will also be exhibiting at this year's show September 29 - October 1 at booth #447. 
In this session, Porto will cover mission-critical questions on the subject of machine learning in big data. These range from model choice, viability horizon, practical design alternatives, learning from on-the-fence model factors, and opportunities to automate access to changing data, and netting-out error and noise. Attendees will walk away from the session with a more complete and informed view of how predictive modeling and optimization are applied to harness the full power and potential of their data. 
WHEN: Wednesday, September 30, 2015, 2:55-3:35PM EDT WHO: Bill Porto , Senior Analytics Engineer, RedPoint Global WHY: Attendees will learn why continual, adaptive optimization is the key to maintaining a leadership position in satisfying customer demand. The session will explain the applicability of machine learning tools with pros/cons for each approach, and discuss how these processes can be optimized to predict, segment, and ultimately drive more predictable outcomes from business decisions. WHERE: Room #1 E14, Strata + Hadoop World, Javits Center, New York, NY
